diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Congenital secondary hypothyroidism due to isolated TSH deficiency
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Diagnosis confirmed by low serum T4 and T3 levels, low serum TSH concentration, and lack of response to TRH stimulation. Genetic analysis showed a homozygous splice site mutation (IVS2/H110015GfA) in the TSH gene common among affected children from consanguineous families.
